text.#text: The

quote.#tail:
means any entity involved
			 in or related to agricultural enterprise, including enterprises that are
			 engaged in the business of production of food and fiber, ranching and raising
			 of livestock, aquaculture, and all other farming and agricultural related
			 industries.
